About Me

A curious product designer obsessed with understanding people and systems.

My Approach

I craft harmonious, effective solutions for users and businesses, constantly juggling data, accessibility, and impact. With over 8 years of experience in product design, I've worked with companies across various industries to solve complex design problems.

Experience

Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work with amazing teams at companies like Devex, Console, Adamo, and more. I specialize in UX research, design systems, and creating accessible interfaces that solve real problems.
